page.title: 07A Leicester school caretaker
page.content: Mr. Smith, our{school caretaker,}works very hard, but he says his life style is simple. He rises at 6am, has{tea {and toast,}and drives to work in his Mini car. After unlocking and checking for vandalism in the mobile classrooms he attends to the gas central heating. The bottom is tidied after use by the Boys' Brigade the previous night. At 8am he brings in the milk for staff and children. At 9am he has a{tea {break}in his office. Between 9.10 and 10.15 he carries out general maintenance. He runs the tuck shop at playtime and brings in the school dinners. Between 12.00 and 2.00 he has his{fish and chip lunch}at home, not far from our Leicester city school. School ends at 3.15 and Mr. Smith sets to work with his cleaning ladies. At 5.15 Mr. Smith goes home, returning on nights when the school is let.
